title: New application
description: Follow the next simple steps to apply for a new project.
welcomeBack: Welcome back! The form below is already filled with the latest information you provided.
clearForm: Eventually, you can [clear the form](clear) and restart if you prefer.

header.title: Name your application
header.description: Do you already have a name you'd like to call your app with?

name.label: Application name
name.hint: This name will be used to save your application and can be changed any time

errors.required: Application name is mandatory to proceed, please specify it
errors.somethingWrong: Something went wrong, try again later

pitch.label: Elevator pitch
pitch.hint: Try to describe your idea in a simple compelling sentence

errors.required: This is a key field, please do your best here

questions.name: description
questions.title: Describe your business idea
questions.description: How you'd describe your business idea and the way your app should work to support it

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.hint: This is a crucial step for the success of your application, take your time

errors.required: This is a mandatory field, please provide your best description

questions.name: context
questions.title: List the similar players
questions.description: Who else do you know is providing a similar app/service already and how you'd think to be different

fields.name: players
fields.label: Other players
fields.hint: Feel free to mention anyone you got inspiration from

fields.name: differences
fields.label: Differentiating factors
fields.hint: Tell us how you imagine to delight your users/customers

questions.name: market
questions.title: Focus the target market
questions.description: Who you'd want to engage in using your app/services?

fields.name: users
fields.label: Ideal users
fields.hint: Describe your ideal user or customer

fields.name: target
fields.label: Geo coverage
fields.hint: Where do you want to start from and how do you see the possibilities world wide

questions.name: revenues
questions.title: Identify the potential revenue streams
questions.description: How you'd imagine this app/idea be generating revenues, eventually

fields.name: revenues
fields.label: Revenues
fields.hint: This is one of the parts we might be able to suggest something about

questions.name: comments
questions.title: Add anything usefull
questions.description: Feel free to add any comment you'd want to be kep into consideration

fields.name: comments
fields.label: Comments
fields.hint: This may help in clarifying the full picture

appSubmit.title: Ready to apply
appSubmit.disclaimer: By subitting this new application I accept the [terms and privacy](terms) conditions under which my application will be evaluated to become one of the active project within the wizdm.io community.

canClear.title: Clear application
canClear.message: Are you sure you want to clear the unsaved application?

canLeave.title: Unsaved changes
canLeave.message: Are you leaving? The draft of this application will be saved till the next time you'll apply.
